title: Kuo: Apple Watch Series 3 could finally be discontinued this year
content:
Apple Watch Series 3 days are numbered as Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo believes the five-year-old smartwatch could meet its end of life in Q3 2022.

more…

The post Kuo: Apple Watch Series 3 could finally be discontinued this year appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple Watch Series 3 days are numbered as analyst Ming-Chi Kuo believes the five-year-old smartwatch could meet its end-of-life in 3Q22.
